title: lost my promos to b2, ya who cares
body:
My client froze up after i accepted to join.  I had to close and restart..  

Why can't i rejoin lobby and instead get the auto 5 min penalty and match loss?

That's all... who cares anyways

replies.body: When you join matchmaking queues, the server needs to group everyone together and place them together.  Constantly losing that sync or declining causes others a negative experience, so you can be placed in a lower priority queue.  It should just be for one game unless it continues.  IF you are having issues still let me know, and I'm happy to help with technical issues.
